page.title: Closure HTML
page.p: An HTML parser written in Common Lisp.

Closure HTML was written by Gilbert Baumann as part of the Closure web browser. It was first converted into a stand-alone installation by Ignas MikalajÅ«nas, and finally reassembled and documented for integration with Closure XML and use with the Closure browser by David Lichteblau under its current name.
It available under an MIT-style license.
Please send bug reports to closure-devel@common-lisp.net (list information).
